Name: Tower of Doom
About the game: Tower of Doom is a VR arcade shooter in which the player has to survive multiple waves of enemies in different levels. Each round the player gets to choose one out of four auto-generated guns in order to move up the highscoreboard and make it to the next stage. Game Modes Normal Mode: You play each round in a new level with increasing difficulty. Before each round, you can choose an additional auto-generated gun, and in a mini-game you can regenerate your health and shields, upgrade your weapons and get back one of four energy impulses. Arcade Mode: You fight only in one level against never-ending waves of enemies. You have no way to regenerate your shields and only four energy impulses. Use them wisely. You can regenerate your health only through very high killstreaks. After every wave you can get one random gun. Archery Mode: You play each round in a new level with increasing difficulty. You have only a Bow and your Arrows and no way to regenerate your shields and only four energy impulses. You can regenerate your health only through very high killstreaks. Current Features 5 different difficulty settings 15 different levels 12 different gun effects 10 different enemies One boss fight 3 different game modes One tutorial level One hidden power-up in each level Upcoming features Much more levels, enemies and guns with intressing abilities. Credits A game by Finn Lichtenberg Soundtrack by Jan Schulten
